message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:2 ratio. This ensures a fair split considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 6:4 split in my favor. While I understand your point about diminishing value, this offer reflects the fact that I'm taking the risk of the money losing more value in the next round.
I propose an equal split of the remaining funds. Given the decreasing value of money, it seems reasonable to ensure both parties receive an equivalent share.
